Title: Scourgerunner Chariots
Legend: Employed to chase down fast-moving prey, Scourgerunner Chariots are swift and deadly war machines armed with a deadly harpoon launcher that can cripple even the most fearsome monster.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single. Each time you include this unit in your army, it can have 3 models. If it has 1 model, the points value is 80. If it has 3 models, the points value is 240.

Intro: Each model in a Scourgerunner Chariots unit is armed with a Ravager Harpoon, Repeater Crossbow and Hook-spear.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dark Steeds are armed with Vicious Bites.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: If this unit has 2 or more models, 1 model in this unit can be a High Beastmaster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s missile weapons.

Rules.Name: Lay The Beast Low
Rules.Fluff: Loosed by a keeneyed aelf, a harpoon sails through the air and sinks deep into its target's vital organs.
Rules.Rule: Lay the Beast Low: The Damage characteristic of this unit’s Ravager Harpoon is 3 for attacks that target an enemy MONSTER.
